bibl.title: A Lexicon of Greek Personal Names. Volume IIIB. Central Greece, from the Megarid to Thessaly. Edited by Peter Marshall FRASER and Elaine MATTHEWS with the assistance of Richard W.V. CATLING and the collaboration of many scholars.
bibl.note: FRASER Peter Marshall and Elaine MATTHEWS, A Lexicon of Greek Personal Names. Volume IIIB. Central Greece, from the Megarid to Thessaly. Edited by Peter Marshall FRASER and Elaine MATTHEWS with the assistance of Richard W.V. CATLING and the collaboration of many scholars.
Oxford, Clarendon Press, 2000, 4°, xxii-478 pp. ISBN 0-19-815293-0. £80.
